events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back on a wrong item received.
An agent specializing in refund requests has been assigned to handle this case.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear about the mix-up with your order. I'll do my best to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received instead of the one you ordered?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item that arrived in my shipment.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and provide a prepaid shipping label for the return of the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund proposal. I appreciate the prepaid label offer for returning the incorrect product.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label emailed to your address. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure the refund was received and that you were able to return the incorrect item without issues.
Yes, I received the refund already and shipped back the wrong item. Everything was handled smoothly, thank you!
We are glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing this case now. Have a great day!
A short survey has been sent to you. We would appreciate your feedback on your support experience with us.
